render.tex: \title{Problem visualization} Plotting graphs and/or creating a picture from the problem statement

reason.tex: %text What does the graph of $y=x^2$ look like? How about $y = x^2$? What will $\left(\vec{a} + \vec{b} \right)$ look like? The ability to create a picture from the facts given in the question will make it easier for you to understand and solve the problem. This is a especially useful skill to have when solving problems on calculus, coordinate geometry \& vector algebra.%
